Instance.description: Interaction that allows a player to pick an object in the world based on tag/definition.
Instance.parents: ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

TunableVariant.name: object_filter
TunableVariant.description: Filter to use to find an object.

TunableTuple.name: object_definitions
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on specific object definitions.

TunableList.name: items_to_check
TunableList.description: A List of the definitions that can be matched to fulfill the filter. This list is considered a Match Any requirement.

Tunable.description: A reference to a definiton that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableTuple.name: object_tags
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on a tag set.

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: A Set of tags that can be matched to fulfill the filter. The set is considered a Match Any requirement.

TunableEnum.description: A reference to a tag that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableVariant.name: on_off_lot_requirement
TunableVariant.description: Whether to accept objects on the active lot.
